items: Place the Diamond Press on a flat surface.
Select the die and material you want to use for your project.
Place the material on the cutting plate.
Place the die on top of the material, with the cutting edge facing down.
Add the second cutting plate on top of the die.
Insert the stack into the Diamond Press, with the handle facing towards you.
Turn the handle clockwise until the stack is fully through the machine.
Remove the cutting plates and carefully remove the material from the die.
Your shape should now be cut and ready to use for your project!
Targets the triceps, chest, and shoulders
Increases upper body strength and muscle definition
Improves overall pushing power
Can be done with dumbbells or a barbell
Engages the core for added stability
Triceps brachii
Pectoralis major
Anterior deltoids
Diamond Push-Up
Diamond Hand Walk
Diamond Plank
Diamond Jumping Jacks
Diamond Mountain Climbers
